project_abstract.cdata: The Dongpu Oil Project will assist the Government in developing oil production in the southern part of the Wenliu oilfield; exploring and evaluating the potential of the eastern part of the oilfield; and recovering liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) from associated gas. It will include a 3-D seismic survey of the South Wenliu and part of the East Wenliu structures, drilling of production, injection, exploration and appraisal wells, and construction of an LPG plant and ancillary facilities. A very important objective of the project is to introduce modern technology and methods of the petroleum industry in China - a process initiated under the Bank's first petroleum project in Daqing. The project will help optimize oil recovery and production rates through appropriate secondary recovery techniques and improved completion practices. It will also provide modern oilfield equipment, computer and training centers, laboratories and technical assistance (including 416 man-months of expatriate consultant services). The main benefits from the project are production of crude oil, gas and natural gas liquids, highly probably discovery of additional reserves, and transfer of technology that will improve operational practices.

P003416.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>中原文留石油项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目协助政府部门在文留油田南部发展石油生产，探测并评估该油田东部地区的潜力，从石油气中回收液化气，开钻生产井、注水井、探测井和评估井，建设一家液化气厂及附属设施。本项目的一大重要目标是向中国石油行业引入现代技术和方法，这一过程已在世行资助的首个大庆石油项目下启动。本项目将通过采用适当的二次回收技术和良好的完工方法，协助提高石油回收率和生产率。项目也将提供现代化石油设备、电脑和技术援助（相当于416个人月的国际咨询专家服务），建设培训中心和实验室。本项目的主要效益包括：（1）原油、液化石油气和液化天然气生产；（2）极有可能发现额外储备；（3）转让可改进业务做法的技术。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
